doc.name: motionStart
doc.summary: Sent to the current card of the defaultStack when a motion starts

example.p: animateDice -- starts an animtion when the user starts a motion

description.overview: Handle the motionStart message to perform an action when the start of a motion is detected by the device.

parameters.parameter: The motion is the type of motion detected by the device.

description.comments:
The motionStart message is set to the current card of the defaultStack when the start of a motion is detected by the device.
As of iPhoneOS 3.0 the only motion that is generated is "shake".
